Container.Name: sqlitebrowser
Container.Overview: DB Browser for SQLite(https://sqlitebrowser.org/) is a high quality, visual, open source tool to create, design, and edit database files compatible with SQLite.
Container.Requires: This image is unprotected by default __**do not**__ expose it to the internet. Please read https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-sqlitebrowser#security for more information.
Container.Changes:
### 2025-07-12 - Rebase to Selkies and Alpine 3.22, HTTPS IS NOW REQUIRED.
### 2024-12-06 - Rebase to Alpine 3.21.
### 2024-05-23 - Rebase to Alpine 3.20.
### 2024-02-10 - Update Readme with new env vars and ingest proper PWA icon.
### 2024-01-02 - Rebase to Alpine 3.19.
### 2023-05-13 - Rebase to Alpine 3.18.
### 2023-03-18 - Rebase to KasmVNC base image.
### 2022-10-23 - Rebase to Alpine 3.16, migrate to s6v3.
### 2022-02-16 - Rebase to Alpine.
### 2021-01-20 - Remove Wireshark reference.
### 2020-07-29 - Initial release.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: Sqlitebrowser desktop gui HTTP, must be proxied.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings and potentially dump files.
